name: Shards Online
description:
In a world where living crystals wage war in the deepest caves, you must strive to become the most powerful crystal of all! Enter the world of Shards: a smooth, seamless, and unique multiplayer physics based shooter for mobile!

Show off your skills in a variety of gamemodes!

FFA


Begin small and weak, and grow by shattering and consuming the players and crystals around you until you reach an unstoppable evolution! Attack enemy bases, or recruit other players to fight by your side as you build a powerful kingdom of your own! Rise to the top of the leaderboard and rule over the cave! With many different crystal varieties each granting different powers, there's no limit to the strength you could attain!

4V4


Squad up with four other players and evolve strong enough to defeat the opposing team! Build a base and protect your teammates as they level up, or launch an early attack on the enemy team to gain an advantage! Make daring plays and persevere through huge teamfights until victory is yours!

Solos


Drop into a huge cave and fend for yourself in an eight player battle royale! Craft precise strategies as you traverse the cavern, absorbing crystals and shattering other players! Avoid the circle of Magnetism as it closes in on the final battlefield, and defeat the remaining players to claim your victory!

1V1


Test your skills against a friend or stranger in a fully-leveled one-on-one battle!
